com.google.enterprise.connector.util.filter

Class AclPropertyFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.enterprise.connector.util.filter.AbstractDocumentFilter
      • com.google.enterprise.connector.util.filter.AclPropertyFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentFilterFactory

    public class AclPropertyFilter
extends AbstractDocumentFilter
    A Document filter that forces the SpiConstants.CaseSensitivityType field for all ACL Principals supplied by the connector to be set to a specified value.

    This will over-ride any SpiConstants.CaseSensitivityType that may have been set by the connector, and supply one if none was set by the connector.

    Example documentFilters.xml Configurations:

    The following example forces all ACL Principals for all fed documents to be considered case-insensitive. 

    
   <!-- Force case-insensitive ACLs. -->
   <bean id="CaseInsensitiveACLs"
      class="com.google.enterprise.connector.util.filter.AclPropertyFilter">
     <property name="caseSensitivityType" value="everything-case-insensitive"/>
   </bean>

    • Method Detail

      • setCaseSensitivityType

        public void setCaseSensitivityType(java.lang.String caseSensitivityType)
        Sets the SpiConstants.CaseSensitivityType to be used for all ACL Principals supplied by the connector.
        Parameters:
        caseSensitivityType - a String representation of a SpiConstants.CaseSensitivityType; i.e. everything-case-sensitive or everything-case-insensitive.

      • findProperty

        public Property findProperty(Document source,
                    java.lang.String name)
                      throws RepositoryException
        Finds a Property by name. If the requested property is ACL property, then checks for case sensitivity type and modifies the value if different than specified in filter. Returns ACL property with modified values.

        Overrides:
        findProperty in class AbstractDocumentFilter
        Parameters:
        source - the source Document for this filter
        name - the name of the property to find
        Returns:
        the Property, if found; null otherwise
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if a repository access error occurs
